mapper.select: select l.id, l.ml_num, i.mb_num, i.mb_name, i.mb_regdate, i.mb_auth, i.mb_nickname, (select ifnull(count(*),0) cnt from class_apply where ml_num=l.ml_num and apply_auth=1) nowclass, (select ifnull(count(*),0) cnt from class_apply where ml_num=l.ml_num) totclass from member_login l,member_info i where i.ml_num = l.ml_num;
mapper.update: update member_login set login_auth=1 where ml_num=#{ml_num}
update member_info set mb_auth=1 where ml_num=#{ml_num}
